channel.title: Banned? Seriously?
channel.description: I got banned for having multiple accounts...All I did was see if I could change my moparcraft name and see if everything switched over, and it didn't so I changed my name back. It's not like I created a new forum name for it or something. My name I had originally was manbearpig, then I changed it to trollmachine because I kinda wanted to play incognito, but none of my stuff transferred over, and so I switched back to manbearpig. Was no intent of trying to cheat or anything. :'(

item.title: Banned? Seriously?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

he isnt banned, it was already taken care of

Read full topic

item.title: Banned? Seriously?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I don’t see why he should stay banned when there are other people with multiple accounts who haven’t gotten banned yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned? Seriously?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

kinda unfair. you were banned for having multiple accounts. no one seemed to do anything about luca, who WAS using his account at an unfair advantage? ah well.

Well I cant really do anything. I can’t ban his alt and I can’t remove the res. All I can do is ban him which is kinda excessive.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned? Seriously?

I got banned for having multiple accounts…All I did was see if I could change my moparcraft name and see if everything switched over, and it didn’t so I changed my name back. It’s not like I created a new forum name for it or something. My name I had originally was manbearpig, then I changed it to trollmachine because I kinda wanted to play incognito, but none of my stuff transferred over, and so I switched back to manbearpig.
